sentence.text: Therefore our study identifies a compartmentalized PtdIns(3,4,5)P<sub>3</sub>/AKT/GSK3Î² signaling axis at cilia in positive regulation of cell proliferation-dependent medulloblastoma that is regulated by protein processing involved in protein targeting to mitochondrion to maintain tumor cell cilia, promote SHH signaling and thereby medulloblastoma progression

entity.text: protein processing involved in protein targeting to mitochondrion

sentence.text: PI3-kinase inhibition or expression of wild-type, but not catalytically inactive HA-protein processing involved in protein targeting to mitochondrion partially rescued cilia loss in Inpp5e-null tumor cells in vitro.

entity.text: protein processing involved in protein targeting to mitochondrion

sentence.text: Conditional deletion of protein processing involved in protein targeting to mitochondrion in a murine model of constitutively active Smoothened-driven medulloblastoma slowed tumor progression, suppressed cell proliferation, reduced SHH signaling and promoted tumor cell cilia loss.

entity.text: protein processing involved in protein targeting to mitochondrion

sentence.text: Sonic Hedgehog (positive regulation of cell proliferation) signaling at primary cilia drives the proliferation and progression of a subset of medulloblastomas, the most common malignant paediatric brain tumor.

Here, we reveal INPP5E promotes positive regulation of cell proliferation signaling in SHH medulloblastoma by negatively regulating a cilia-compartmentalized PI3-kinase signaling axis that maintains primary cilia on tumor cells.
